content:
From: "Jens-D. Doll" <jd@cococo.de>
Good morning, Isabelle,

there has recently been an update of the Elbe theory viewer because of
Windows 8. The new UI needed some adoptions and also required different
libraries. You can view and print your theories on an Windows machine with
this tool. It's faster than other software, because it's a native code
program. The download link is
http://cococo.de/Elbe

Happy weekend,
Jens
